description: A young black pianist becomes embroiled in the lives of an upper-class white family set among the racial tensions, infidelity, violence and other nostalgic events in early 1900s New York City.
keywords: racial injustice,racial slur,period drama,american film directed by czech director,american film directed by european director
name: Ragtime

review.name: Just a quick note for now -- Ragtime is not set in the 30s or the 20s ...
review.reviewBody:
But rather at the turn of the Century, in the 'ought years. That is not a quibble, since a good part of the interest of this movie is based upon its serving as a fairly rare window into life in that period. Whereas, there are skads of movies set in the 30's, and a fair number set in the 20s (in addition to the silents of that era), as the plot summary and some user comments erroneously have the movie era.

Stanford White, America's greatest architect and one of New York's leading figures at the time, was murdered in 1906 -- which is of course the beginning date of this movie. It ends with war being declared as announced by a newspaper headline -- WWI of course. Which marked the end of the era.
